incident_updates.body: We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our offer on the specific Cluster9062. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 17/07/2025 10:52 UTC Impacted Service(s) : We are currently facing an issue with Cluster9062, which is temporarily inaccessible. The datastores hosted on this cluster are also unavailable. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our our Managed vSphere offer., which is causing temporary availability issues in Cluster9062. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 17/07/2025 10:52 UTC Impacted Service(s) : We are currently facing an issue with Cluster9062, which is temporarily inaccessible. The datastores hosted on this cluster are also unavailable. Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer. Start time : 21/07/2025 06:30 UTC End time : 21/07/2025 21:00 UTC Service impact : During the operation, customers may experience a few seconds of slowness when reading from or writing to their datastore. However, there will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability or virtual machines. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 21/07/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 24/07/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers. Thank you for your understanding.

affected_components.name: Managed VMware Cloud Director || ERI - Storage

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 21/07/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 24/07/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : During the maintenance, vSphere won't be accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode for 1 hour. vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our vSphere offer. An individual communication will be done to inform customers. Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager. Thank you for your understanding

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 21/07/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 24/07/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : vSphere not accesible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer. An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager. Thank you for your understanding.
